from pyspark.sql.functions import *
from pyspark.sql.types import *
from pyspark.sql import DataFrame
##### Create a view for the data, joining harmonised tables where necessary

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_migration_db.vw_nsip_document

AS

SELECT DISTINCT 

tbl.documentId,
tbl.caseId,
tbl.caseRef,
tbl.documentReference,
tbl.version,
tbl.examinationRefNo,
tbl.filename,
tbl.originalFilename,
tbl.size,
tbl.mime,
COALESCE(tbl.documentURI, '') AS documentURI,
tbl.publishedDocumentURI,
tbl.path,
tbl.virusCheckStatus,
tbl.fileMD5,
tbl.dateCreated,
tbl.lastModified,
LOWER(tbl.caseType) AS caseType,
tbl.redactedStatus,
CASE
    WHEN tbl.PublishedStatus = 'Depublished'
    THEN 'unpublished'
    ELSE REPLACE(
        LOWER(tbl.PublishedStatus),
        ' ',
        '_')
END AS publishedStatus,
tbl.datePublished,
tbl.documentType,
tbl.securityClassification,
tbl.sourceSystem,
tbl.origin,
tbl.owner,
tbl.author,
tbl.authorWelsh,
tbl.representative,
tbl.description,
tbl.descriptionWelsh,
CASE
    WHEN tbl.DocumentCaseStage = "Developer's Application"
    THEN 'developers_application'
    WHEN tbl.DocumentCaseStage = 'Post decision'
    THEN 'post_decision'
    ELSE LOWER(tbl.DocumentCaseStage)	            
END AS documentCaseStage,
tbl.filter1,
tbl.filter1Welsh,
tbl.filter2,
tbl.horizonFolderId,
tbl.transcriptId	

FROM odw_harmonised_db.nsip_document tbl

INNER JOIN (

    SELECT documentId, filename, version, MAX(IngestionDate) AS latest_date
    FROM odw_harmonised_db.nsip_document
    WHERE LOWER(ODTSourceSystem) = 'horizon'
    GROUP BY documentId, filename, version
    
) latest ON tbl.documentId = latest.documentId AND tbl.filename = latest.filename AND tbl.version = latest.version AND tbl.IngestionDate = latest.latest_date   

WHERE LOWER(tbl.ODTSourceSystem) = 'horizon';
##### Create a DataFrame of the data from the view

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
view_df = spark.sql('SELECT * FROM odw_curated_migration_db.vw_nsip_document')
view_df.write.mode("overwrite").saveAsTable('odw_curated_migration_db.nsip_document')
